channel.title: All right, I need a good coder :)
channel.description:
So I've been working with phpBB3 site integration for my website... and now i need some help from a MITB experienced coder!
So i've gotten login integrated onto my site, and now i'm aiming for grabbing posts... I found a news mod on phpBB.com, which you can see [url=http://www.phpbb.com/community/viewtopic.php?f=70&t=574212&st=0&sk=t&sd=a]here[/url]
It however, doesn't work... So if anyone can help me configure it/ build a new one, It would be amazing!
I'll still be working on one, and i'll post if i figure it out

item.title: All right, I need a good coder :)
item.dc:creator: @d_sign d_sign
item.description:
@d_sign wrote:

lmao you’re right
sorry :X

Dump me the SQL code structure for SMF and I’ll do it for you

Read full topic

item.title: All right, I need a good coder :)
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

[quote=“d_sign, post:5, topic:192149”]All you really need to do is replace the SQL table and the names of the variables…
$row[‘example’] would fetch from a row that is named Example[/quote]
No, it would fetch a field in the current row iteration named example.

Read full topic

item.title: All right, I need a good coder :)
item.dc:creator: @d_sign d_sign
item.description:
@d_sign wrote:

Actually, I just figured it out
Since you guys are so amazing, here’s the script:

[code]<?php
define(“IN_PHPBB”,true);
// Put database connection variables here
$hostname=“";
$user="”;"; //user name to access database
$pass= “=“";"; //password
$dbase="="”;”; //database name

$connection = mysql_connect("$hostname" , “$user” , “$pass”) or die (“Cannot connect to MySQL”);
$db = mysql_select_db($dbase , $connection) or die (“Cannot select database.”);

$q = "SELECT * FROM phpbb_posts WHERE forum_id=‘2’ ORDER BY topic_id DESC, post_id ";
$result= mysql_query($q, $connection) or die
(“Could not execute query : $q.” . mysql_error());

$rows_per_page=3; // adjust the number here to display number of news entries per page
$total_records=mysql_num_rows($result);
$pages = ceil($total_records / $rows_per_page);

$screen=0;
$start = $screen * $rows_per_page;
$q .= “LIMIT $start, $rows_per_page”;
$result= mysql_query($q, $connection) or die
(“Could not execute query : $q.” . mysql_error());

while ($row=mysql_fetch_array($result))
{
$id=$row[“post_id”];
$name=$row[“post_username”];
$entry=$row[“post_subject”];
$title=$row[“post_subject”];
?>

<?PHP echo $title;?>

<?php } #while ?>[/code]

I took a code from Daydreamgraphics.com and modified it to suck from phpBB
Oh, and thanks error.login for the offer

Read full topic
